Compatible with iOS 8, 9 and 10

[Main functions]

Swipe (Up / Down) on the application icon with badge and the clear menu will be displayed.

======
Option
======
- You can set the direction to swipe.
- If "Icon Swipe" is turned off, execute with the icon tap.
- Turning "Disable SpotLight" on will invalidate the behavior when swiping the home screen down.
- Erase the badge of the application selected with "Hide Badges".
(You need to open the App Switcher)

It is possible to turn ON/OFF the function in the Settings and Flipswitch.

Configure options from Settings app.

Source code.
